Title: Relates to including bodegas and delicatessens in the definition of food service establishment
Summary: Requires the department of agriculture and markets to post the results of its graded inspections of retail food stores on their website and provide information as to where a customer may file a consumer report.
LawCode: Amd ยง500, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring the department of agriculture and markets to post the results of its graded inspections on their website
